00072   class ConfigurationParamListener
00073   {
00074   public:
00098     static const char* toString(ConfigurationParamListenerType type)
00099     {
00100       static const char* typeString[] =
00101         {
00102           "ON_UPDATE_CONFIG_PARAM",
00103           "CONFIG_PARAM_LISTENER_NUM"
00104         };
00105       if (type < CONFIG_PARAM_LISTENER_NUM)
00106         {
00107           return typeString[type];
00108         }
00109       return "";
00110     }
